channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ford Maverick Hybrid AWD 2025: prices, specs availability, review
item.description: The new four-wheel-drive electrified pickup has arrived, and it's better than ever. There's just one snag. It's made in Mexico.

item.title: Meta introduces restricted Teen Accounts to Facebook and Messenger
item.description: Meta is introducing Teen Accounts to Facebook and Messenger. The feature, which automatically enrolls young users into an app experience with built-in...

item.title: IBM releases a new mainframe built for the age of AI
item.description: IBM is releasing the latest version of its mainframe hardware that includes new updates meant to accelerate AI adoption. The hardware and consulting c...

item.title: Apple might import more iPhones from India to side-step China tariffs
item.description: Apple is considering importing more iPhones from India to side-step the 54% additional tariffs on goods imported from China that U.S. President Donald...

item.title: Turkey’s Sipay raises $78M to expand its Stripe-like services into emerging markets
item.description: Billing itself as “Stripe for emerging markets,” Turkish Fintech Sipay has raised a $78 million Series B funding round, claiming a valuation of $875 m...

item.title: Adidas Promo Codes & Deals: 30% Off
item.description: Save up to 30% with our Adidas coupon and join the adiClub to enjoy great benefits, like 15% off, plus other member-exclusive deals.

item.title: Daily Harvest Review: Good Meals for Single Vegans Who Don’t Mind Mush
item.description: These vegan, gluten-free delivery meals take the work out of meal prep, although the food can be a little boring (and mushy).

item.title: SteelSeries Apex Pro Mini Gen 3: A Hall Effect 60% Keyboard
item.description: This could’ve been the apex of compact gaming keyboards, but it has a few too many flaws and a high price.

item.title: Scientists Claim to Have Brought Back the Dire Wolf
item.description: Startup Colossal Biosciences has edited the DNA of a gray wolf to produce what it says is a de-extincted animal. Does that make it a true dire wolf?

item.title: Google is allegedly paying some AI staff to do nothing for a year rather than join rivals
item.description: Retaining top AI talent is tough amid cutthroat competition between Google, OpenAI, and other heavyweights. Google’s AI division, DeepMind, has resort...
